basics.name: Jonathan Valencia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in the Fall of 2022.

highlights: Oversees and trains new hires following the training schedules set by staff members
Manages the schedules of all student employees and ensures that it is updated weekly
Leads new projects and tasks in collaboration with staff members
Acts as a welcoming face for the library and handles all circulation desk duties and transactions
Learned how Overwatch League and esports as a whole operates on a global scale through interaction with Overwatch League staff
Collaborated closely with fellow interns and Overwatch League staff to ensure that their standards of competitive integrity were maintained
Troubleshot and stress-tested the Overwatch League hardware and servers to verify that it was fit for competition

volunteer.summary: Player and content representative for the Overwatch A Team

awards.title: Ka Hikina O Ka La
awards.summary: A specialized program at UHMC funded by the National Science Foundation. Ka Hikina O Ka La is committed to increasing the participation of Native Hawaiians in higher education and guiding them to leadership roles in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM). The program aims to continuously build strong relationships among cultural resources, scientists, technicians, educators, STEM employers, and community leaders.
